hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
cat << EOF > sshConnectionTestJira.py import paramiko import select import time import re import sys import traceback import cnlsender import re import os import subprocess from subprocess import Popen, PIPE
server_ip=sys.argv[1] jira_source_path=sys.argv[2].split(',') jira_dest_path=sys.argv[3].split(',')
print (jira_source_path) print (jira_dest_path)
centos_username='centos' centos_password='' privateKey = paramiko.RSAKey.from_private_key_file("/home/centos/.ssh/AudioCodes-CICD-Apps.pem") # Functions definitions
def sendWait(command, timeout=20.0, waitfor="#"): return cnlsender.sendWait(channel, command, timeout, waitfor)
def sendWithoutWait(command): return cnlsender.sendWithoutWait(channel, command)
def justWait(timeout=20.0, waitfor="#"): return cnlsender.justWait(channel, timeout, waitfor)
#open SSH session to the server try: client = paramiko.SSHClient() client.set_missing_host_key_policy(paramiko.AutoAddPolicy()) client.connect(server_ip, port=22, username=centos_username,pkey=privateKey) transport = client.get_transport() channel = transport.open_session() channel.get_pty(term='xterm', width=80, height=24) channel.invoke_shell() except paramiko.ssh_exception.AuthenticationException: print "We had an authentication exception!" shell = None
#switch to root user justWait(20.0,"\$") sendWait("sudo -i",20.0)
#copy all files to the directory sendWait("cd /home/centos/tempFilesToCopyTestJira") for source_path in jira_source_path: sendWait('jiraSourcePaths+="{} "'.format(source_path)) for dest_path in jira_dest_path: sendWait('jiraDestPaths+="{} "'.format(dest_path))
sendWait("jiraSourcePaths=(\${jiraSourcePaths})") sendWait("jiraDestPaths=(\${jiraDestPaths})") for i in range(len(jira_source_path)): sendWait('i="{}"'.format(i)) sendWait("echo *******cp \${jiraSourcePaths[\$i]} \${jiraDestPaths[\$i]}*******") sendWait("\cp \${jiraSourcePaths[\$i]} \${jiraDestPaths[\$i]}")
sendWait("rm -rf $HOME/tempFilesToCopyTestJira/*")
channel.close client.close sys.exit(0); EOF

#show all files that modified in the current change server_ip="test-acjira" modifiedFiles=($(git diff --name-only HEAD~1 HEAD)) #extract from first line in the modified file, the path of the file in test-acjira Server seperator="//PATH:" #ARRAY=() #jiraDestPaths=() #jiraSourcePaths=() jiraDestPath=$(cat ${modifiedFiles[0]} | head -1) isFileNeedToBeCopied=$(echo $jiraDestPath | grep -c "PATH:") if [[ $isFileNeedToBeCopied -eq 0 ]] then #string not contained in file echo "File Dont need to be Copy, Doesnt Contain PATH:" jiraDestPaths="" jiraSourcePaths="" else #string is in file at least once jiraDestPath=$(echo "${jiraDestPath//$seperator/$''}") jiraDestPaths="${jiraDestPath}/" sourcePath=$(echo ${modifiedFiles[0]} | awk -F/ '{print $NF}') jiraSourcePaths=$HOME/tempFilesToCopyTestJira/${sourcePath} scp -i $HOME/.ssh/AudioCodes-CICD-Apps.pem ${WORKSPACE}/${modifiedFiles[0]} centos@${server_ip}:"'$HOME/tempFilesToCopyTestJira/${sourcePath}'" fi for filePath in ${modifiedFiles[@]:1} do jiraDestPath=$(cat ${filePath} | head -1) isFileNeedToBeCopied=$(echo $jiraDestPath | grep -c "PATH:") if [ $isInFile -eq 0 ]; then #string not contained in file echo "File Dont need to be Copy, Doesnt Contain PATH:" else #string is in file at least once jiraDestPath=$(echo "${jiraDestPath//$seperator/$''}") sourcePath=$(echo ${filePath} | awk -F/ '{print $NF}') jiraDestPaths+=",${jiraDestPath}/" if [[ "$jiraSourcePaths" == "" || "$jiraDestPaths" == "" ]] then jiraSourcePaths+="$HOME/tempFilesToCopyTestJira/${sourcePath}" jiraDestPaths+="${jiraDestPath}/" else jiraSourcePaths+=",$HOME/tempFilesToCopyTestJira/${sourcePath}" jiraDestPaths+=",${jiraDestPath}/" fi scp -i $HOME/.ssh/AudioCodes-CICD-Apps.pem ${WORKSPACE}/${filePath} centos@${server_ip}:"'$HOME/tempFilesToCopyTestJira/${sourcePath}'" fi done
#check if JiraSourcePath is empty, not copy anything if [[ "$jiraSourcePaths" == "" ]] then echo "Does not Copy Any file, None of the files Contain PATH:" exit 0 fi python2.7 sshConnectionTestJira.py $server_ip ${jiraSourcePaths} ${jiraDestPaths}
